content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with fuel source coal and result iron-plate.

### Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into furnace
- Ensure you can insert items into the furnace before attempting to insert.
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory to insert into the furnace.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest before attempting to harvest.
- Make sure there are resources available to harvest.

### Errors when moving to nearest resource
- Ensure you are moving to the correct resource location.
- Make sure the resource is available and within reach.
